metadata.description: Marketplace for plan annotation plugins, enabling Claude to annotate plan steps with which skills, agents, and MCP servers will be used.

plugins.name: plan-annotate-skills
plugins.description: Annotate plan steps with which skills will be used. Provides /planning-skills-annotations-on and /planning-skills-annotations-off commands with persistent configuration.

plugins.name: plan-annotate-agents
plugins.description: Annotate plan steps with which agents will be useful. Provides /planning-agents-annotations-on and /planning-agents-annotations-off commands with persistent configuration.

plugins.name: plan-annotate-mcp
plugins.description: Annotate plan steps with which MCP servers will be used. Provides /planning-mcp-annotations-on and /planning-mcp-annotations-off commands with persistent configuration.
